products.title: Amari Blackout Cream Rigid Pvc 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Amari blackout, is a beautiful blackout fabric which will really stand out in any room, its very ideal for your kitchen, bathroom and commercial environments and at a very affordable price. Give your windows an upgrade with this textured vertical blind. Product id: db-dvtb1113 fabric colour: cream material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating headrail: metal headrail slat width: 89mm control type: wand and cord energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes amari blackout cream rigid pvc 89mm vertical blind in cream.

products.title: Shot Silk Mink Blackout Vertical Blind
products.description: Blackout vertical blinds are a fabulously practical choice and this shot silk mink blind is wonderfully elegant too. The silk look fabric with its gentle mink colour, gorgeous lustre and slub detail is undeniably sophisticated and will add a lovely note to any space. Plea blackout vertical blinds are a fabulously practical choice and this shot silk mink blind is wonderfully elegant too.

products.title: Memphis Fr Cream (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition:polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
